Award.AwardTitle: Student travel grants for Symposium On Usable Privacy and Security 2013

Directorate.LongName: Directorate for Computer & Information Science & Engineering

Division.LongName: Division of Computer and Network Systems

Award.AbstractNarration: The Symposium On Usable Privacy and Security (SOUPS) brings together an interdisciplinary group of researchers and practitioners in human computer interaction, security, and privacy. The program features technical papers, workshops and tutorials, a poster session, panels and invited talks, and discussion sessions. The ninth SOUPS will be held July 24-26, 2013 at Northumbria University in Newcastle, UK. The funds support travel grants for American students to attend the conference. SOUPS is the top conference devoted to usable privacy and security. By increasing student participation at the SOUPS conference, it may encourage more students to get involved in usable security research and pursue further graduate education and careers in this area.
